import securityObj from './security.devdocs.json';

This plugin provides authentication and authorization features, and exposes functionality to understand the capabilities of the currently authenticated user.

Contact [Platform Security](https://github.com/orgs/elastic/teams/kibana-security) for questions regarding this plugin.

**Code health stats**

| 250 | 0 | 90 | 0 |
